LanguageData.Apparel_HarrowedCassock.label: cassock
LanguageData.Apparel_PeakedHat.label: peaked priest hat
LanguageData.Apparel_PeakedHat.description: A pointy hat traditionally worn by high-ranking harrowed.
LanguageData.Apparel_PeakedHatTwo.label: peaked hat
LanguageData.Apparel_PeakedHatTwo.description: A pointy hat traditionally worn by harrowed.
LanguageData.Apparel_HPmask.label: purger helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_HPmask.description: A baggy looking helmet filled with an assortment of herbs.
LanguageData.Apparel_HPsuit.label: purger exosuit
LanguageData.Apparel_HFmask.label: flagellant hood
LanguageData.Apparel_HFmask.description: A hood that gives off the aroma of different herbs, blood and sweat.
LanguageData.Apparel_HGold.label: pristine armor
LanguageData.Apparel_HOwl.label: pristine owl helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_MilitantVeil.label: militant veil
LanguageData.Apparel_MilitantVeil.description: A metal helmet adorned with a flowing, red veil.
LanguageData.Apparel_HarrowedCommanderMask.label: harrowed commander mask
LanguageData.Apparel_HarrowedCommanderMask.descriptio: A full helmet worn by high ranking Harrowed.
LanguageData.Apparel_HarrowedCommander.label: commander armor
LanguageData.Apparel_HarrowedCommander.description: A suit of armor worn by high ranking Harrowed.
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueEradicatorHelmet.label: plague eradicator helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueEradicatorHelmet.descripti: As the white horse roared across the lands a particular oppulent, noble house took it upon themselves to purge the filth and disease wherever they rode. This rusty helmet belonged to one of such plague eradicators, a relic of hardships that passed and of hardships that are yet to arrive.
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueEradicatorArmor.label: plague eradicator armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueEradicatorArmor.descriptio: A relic of times long past, of times where disease and pestilence swept the land with fury beyond human understanding.
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueEradicatorHelmetTwo.label: plague eradicator armet
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueEradicatorHelmetTwo.descri: As the white horse roared across the lands the people took up arms to fight back. Iron and blood sprawled across the soil.
